title: OFEKOK
author: OFEKOK
content: The rig is rebooting itself ... and I dont know why. I set the wallet and everything on, raveos: Miner: T-rex 0.26.8 , pool : 2miners , adress, and it still keep rebooting itself.if there is any guide to help me with thatmaybe the tunning section has a problemi dont know please help

comments.author: smilodon
comments.body: kawpow algo has high power consumption. hangs and restarts the system because it cannot provide enough power to the graphics cards. lower the clocks of the cards to 3/4 as well as the millivolt voltage.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.created_time: October 30, 2022, 12:48:39 PMLast edit: November 02, 2022, 09:44:29 AM by FP91G
comments.body: Check out this guideHow to Mine on RaveOS: Detailed Guide and Mining Setuphttps://2miners.com/blog/how-to-mine-on-raveos-detailed-guide-and-mining-setup/Raveos is a very easy system to set up. I connect the monitor and see how the miner works.Common reasons for a reboot would be overclocking or low power limit. First, start the system on default settings.If you have not done maintenance, then clean all the raisers and contacts of the video card.

comments.author: OFEKOK
comments.body: Quote from: smilodon on October 29, 2022, 01:28:44 PMkawpow algo has high power consumption. hangs and restarts the system because it cannot provide enough power to the graphics cards. lower the clocks of the cards to 3/4 as well as the millivolt voltage. thanks . is there any guide to guide me what to do ?Quote from: FP91G on October 30, 2022, 12:48:39 PMCheck out this guideHow to Mine on RaveOS: Detailed Guide and Mining Setuphttps://2miners.com/blog/how-to-mine-on-raveos-detailed-guide-and-mining-setup/Raveos is a very easy system to set up. I connect the monitor and see how the miner works.Common reasons for a reboot would be overclocking or low power limit. First, start the system on default settings.If you have not done technical listening, then clean all the raisers and contacts of the video card.thanks ill try

comments.author: smilodon
comments.body: unfortunately I can't guide you because I have been mining with nvidia for many years.

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: Can you provide more info about your hardware and symptons?Hard to guess what's the problem with lack of informartionPost here about your PSU, GPUs, motherboard, if you're doing overclock, your settings and signals that your hardware is giving when restarts.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Personally I never mine with Raveos, so I can't comment what's the problem you faced during installation and set up your mining rigs. But there's few tutorials that you can follow to set up Raveos correctly, especially there's a video where the channel use Raveos to mine Ravencoin. 1. https://rvn.2miners.com/help22. https://2miners.com/blog/how-to-mine-on-raveos-detailed-guide-and-mining-setup/3. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FECnB-tQYTMYou could contact their telegram or customer service about your problem too https://raveos.com/help.html

comments.author: YellowSwap
comments.body: In a bear market, the worst algorithm anyone can mine are those that consume lots of power for example kawpow algorithm, since this same algorithm is what ravencoin is currently using I have to warn you, do not mine ravencoin, mine Flux or other.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: YellowSwap on November 03, 2022, 06:44:36 AMIn a bear market, the worst algorithm anyone can mine are those that consume lots of power for example kawpow algorithm, since this same algorithm is what ravencoin is currently using I have to warn you, do not mine ravencoin, mine Flux or other. This is already a question for the mining calculator.On cold video cards, you can mine any coin, on hot video cards you will need closed cases with additional cooling. But winter is coming and an open window is enough to cool 5-10 mining farms, so you can mine the most profitable coin.
